translation.Visioon: Kamur Finance OÜ allows for easy and remote accounting which includes daily paperless recording. Starting your own micro enterprise might seem to aquire so much effort at first, especially if you have no previous experience with accounting. Write to us and we will take care of all the annoying tasks while you create something good!
translation.AccountingTitle: Choose hourly accounting OR make your own packet:
translation.choice3: Up to 10 purchase invoices per month (EE)
translation.choice5: Up to 5 sales invoices per month
translation.choice6: Up to 6-15 sales invoices per month
translation.choice9: Annual report recording in RIK (micro enterprise)
translation.choice11: Purchase invoices EU, USA, GBD (up to 5 per month)
translation.choice12: Submitting income tax declaration for dividends
translation.choice13: Recording single transactions (compensation for the use of the personal passenger car, recording changes in equity etc.)
translation.EiOleKaibekas: *Kamur Finance OÜ does not hold Value added tax (VAT) identification number
